title: Perioperative factors and 30-day major complications following radical cystectomy: A single-center study in Thailand
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Songyot Veerakulwatana, Chalairat Suk-ouichai, Tawatchai Taweemonkongsap, Ekkarin Chotikawanich, Siros Jitpraphai, Varat Woranisarakul, Nattaporn Wanvimolkul, Thitipat Hansomwong
